EmailTemplate.name: Booking Unit
EmailTemplate.subject: #FleetToGo {!FleetToGo__c.Name} for customer {!Opportunity.Account} has been submitted for your approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Approver You are receiving this notification because the {!Units__c.Name} from #FleetToGo {!FleetToGo__c.Name} for customer {!Units__c.Customer_Name__c} has been submitted for booking:
Requestor: {!Units__c.LastModifiedBy} Fleet Name: {!FleetToGo__c.Fleet_Name__c}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
